title: Celestrial Lancer
description: In the second exciting installment, Alicia with the help of Felix and Riddle explore the fourth Unknown Territory and encounter the Sacred Water's Guardian.Meanwhile, the number one ranking warrior confronts one of our heroes and is suddenly forced into combat.The Consultant, tired of the warrior's continuous failure to stop the party, decides to handle them personally!From underwater sanctums to floating Islands above the clouds, our heroes won't give up until all five Unknown Territories are located and safe from the Consultants!
author: Michael  Rogers
